titleStmt.title: The magistrates authority, in matters of religion; and the souls immortality, vindicated in two sermons preach'd at York. / By Christopher Cartvvright, B.D. and Minister of Gods Word there.
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, Christopher, 1602-1658.
Leigh, Edward, 1602-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Underhill, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Bible in great Woodstreet.,

notesStmt.note: "An advertisement to the reader" and "To the Christian reader" are signed by Edward Leigh [Thomason Catalogue erroneously has "Edmund" Leigh].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
